check.name: ParameterNumber
check.description: Checks the number of parameters of a method or constructor.

property.name: ignoreAnnotatedBy
property.description: Ignore methods and constructors annotated with the specified annotation(s).

property.name: ignoreOverriddenMethods
property.description: Ignore number of parameters for methods with {@code @Override} annotation.

property.name: max
property.description: Specify the maximum number of parameters allowed.
